title: 1960년 Albert Pearlman, Inc. v. Board of Education 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Albert Pearlman, Inc. v. Board of Education. 판결일: 1960-09-27. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Albert Pearlman, Inc. v. Board of Education of the City of New York
**판결일**: 1960-09-27
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 11 A.D.2d 934

## 판결문 요약


— Order, dated October 5, 1959, granting defendant’s motion for summary judgment and dismissing the complaint pursuant to rule 113 of the Rules of Civil Practice, unanimously affirmed, with $2Q costs and disbursements to the respondent. No opinion. Concur —Botein, P. J., Breitel, Rabin, Valente and Eager, JJ.
...
